import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Components/FolderTreeView" />

# Default Folder Tree View Factory

```jsx
const DefaultFolderTreeViewFactory = (props) => {
	const {Component = FolderTreeView, _links, ...otherProps} = props;

	const ComposedFolderTreeView = R.compose(withSnackbar, withTreeQueryLoader)(Component);

	return (
		<ComposedFolderTreeView {...otherProps} browseLink={_links.browse}/>
	);
};
```
